== Local CD/DVD and iso Distribution ==

We provide every distribution of Ubuntu and Other Linux iso images at <nowiki>[[MyanmarTeam-ContactUs-UnofficialLocalContacts|u4mm units]]</nowiki> to be easy to get, share and contribute others.

* We are trying to distribute the latest version of Ubuntu (11.10) to Mandalay City on late 20 of October this year. The detail of the distribution registration form can be found <nowiki>[[http://u4mdy.doattend.com/ | here]]</nowiki>. Full detail of the distribution procedure in Burmese Language can be found of our <nowiki>[[http://u4mm.com/project/u4mdy-ubuntu-for-mandalay/ | web page ]]</nowiki>.
